C

calculateInSampleSize(BitmapFactory.Options, int, int) - Method in class com.isbx.androidtools.media.ImageResizer
For a bitmap whose dimensions are represented by options, calculates the largest sample size that will result in a sampled bitmap whose dimensions will be equal to or greater than reqWidth and reqHeight.
clearFiles() - Method in class com.isbx.androidtools.media.ImageResizer
Deletes any temporary files that may have been created by previous resize operations.

createLargeImage(Uri) - Method in class com.isbx.androidtools.media.ImageResizer
Creates a scaled copy of the given image according to the large output settings in this ImageResizer's ImageResizeConfig.
createMediumImage(Uri) - Method in class com.isbx.androidtools.media.ImageResizer
Creates a scaled copy of the given image according to the medium output settings in this ImageResizer's ImageResizeConfig.
createSmallImage(Uri) - Method in class com.isbx.androidtools.media.ImageResizer
Creates a scaled copy of the given image according to the small output settings in this ImageResizer's ImageResizeConfig.
